faq.title: Caracteristicas
faq.desc: We use a newly developed technology to connect sites that are based on different types of servers and networks, SiteConnect, which helps to reduce the misinterpretation of signals as well as the loss of data during transfering.

faq.title: Beneficios
faq.desc: To keep your systems, your devices, and network stay secure, we have developed a new program that limits the access of suspicious objects or people and authenticate all logins to the system.

faq.title: Requisitos
faq.desc: Some hosts are unaware of the potential risks as well as security loopholes in their system. By detecting these errors and taking prompt actions on improving firewalls, we can upgrade the system security.

faq.title: Tasas
faq.desc: The internal network is essential for all companies and corporations, especially for those working in IT sector. To avoid possible risks when sharing internal confidential files and documentation to an external receiver, internal network must be strong.

items.title: Banco Popular
items.desc: El Banco Popular es una entidad financiera colombiana perteneciente al Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores, con sede principal en la ciudad de Bogotá que lleva una trayectoria de más de sesenta años.

items.title: AV Villa
items.desc: Banco AV Villas es un banco de Colombia que fue fundado en 1972 como Corporación de Ahorro y Vivienda Las Villas. En 1997 se convirtió en una subsidiaria de Grupo Aval Acciones y Valores.

items.title: BBVA Colombia
items.desc: BBVA es una filial bancaria colombiana, operada por la matriz española BBVA.

items.title: Fondo Nacional del Ahorro
items.desc: El Fondo Nacional de Ahorro es una institución bancaria colombiana creada, a través del Decreto Extraordinario 3118 de 1968, para administrar las cesantías de los empleados públicos y trabajadores oficiales.
